title: A Chat app leveraging LangChain framework
description: This app allows users to interact with a language model using the LangChain framework.
next_steps: Put your OPENAI API key in the `template.env` file and rename it to `.env`.
Run the app with `shiny run app-express.py`.

follow_up.text: Need help obtaining an API key?
Learn how to obtain one at https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
Want to learn more about AI chatbots?
